title: Chicago Meetup This Saturday
summary:
Key ideas:
- Scott is hosting a meetup in Chicago as part of the Meetups Everywhere tour
- The meetup will be held at South Loop Strength & Conditioning gym
- Anyone is welcome to attend, regardless of whether they feel awkward, are not familiar with SSC, etc.

Key learnings:
- Meetups Everywhere is a way for Scott and SSC readers to meet in person
- The Chicago meetup is open to all and aims to create a friendly space for people to connect

Key questions:
- What are people's concerns about attending the meetup?
- How can Scott make attendees feel comfortable at the event?
